channel.title: A quick question
channel.description:
Is it possible to make NPC 'aggressive'? So when you get in a certain radius they will attack you.
Also will it be possible to make like in normal RS if you're twice as high level as them, they leave you alone.
For example.
A goblin level 5 will attack an player with level 3-9. A goblin won't attack a player level 10+.
Thanks for your time!
Sincerly, Dealman.

item.title: A quick question
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

I just kinda noticed, both questions mean the same thing. By aggressive I mean they attack you if you get to close.

Read full topic

item.title: A quick question
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

aggressive - yes
The other. no idea how’d it be done if it can, most jads are aggressive.

Read full topic

item.title: A quick question
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

Is it possible to make NPC ‘aggressive’? So when you get in a certain radius they will attack you.

Also will it be possible to make like in normal RS if you’re twice as high level as them, they leave you alone.

For example.

A goblin level 5 will attack an player with level 3-9.
A goblin won’t attack a player level 10+.
